overview_of_class: This course reviews current research on teacher thinking and learning. In particular, it examines the knowledge needed for teaching and how to support teacher learning by establishing a community of learners. Participants will design supports for teacher learning at their schools through an examination of existing teaching routines and a diagnosis of challenges particular to the school.
name: Teacher Leadership: Teacher Thinking and Learning
title: SESP MS_ED 449-0-20 Teacher Leadership: Teacher Thinking and Learning

descriptions.name: Overview of class

Participants will design supports for teacher learning at their schools through an examination of existing teaching routines and a diagnosis of challenges particular to the school.
